title: [Hragon's Colorant, Exchange]
description: Several attendants tend to various customers throughout this bustling room, answering question after question and fulfilling orders.  A long wooden shelf is attached to the far wall with neatly organized flasks sitting atop it.  A small glass case is located along the west wall, a variety of vials proudly displayed within.  Along the east wall sits a large table, all manner of dyes resting upon it.
